dailyDharma.heading: Begin Your Journey to Inner Peace

dailyDharma.findPeaceTitle: Find Peace and Clarity with Daily Practices

dailyDharma.findPeaceSubtitle2: Make dharma a part of your daily rhythm. Start your day with spiritual clarity and return whenever your soul needs a reset.

dailyDharma.familyFooter: Create a shared journey for peace and connection!
dailyDharma.faq1Title: Why build a daily spiritual practice?
dailyDharma.faq1Desc:
In a world of constant noise, daily spiritual practice is a quiet anchor. It grounds your energy, purifies your intent, and gently brings you back to what matters. KalpX offers simple, accessible practices ‚Äî from morning chants and breathwork to evening reflection and gratitude ‚Äî so that spirituality becomes not a task, but a rhythm.

Whether you light a diya before work, repeat a mantra on your commute, or take 2 minutes to sit in silence before sleep ‚Äî these small rituals create big shifts over time. Consistency becomes connection. Repetition becomes realization.

Let KalpX help you infuse your everyday with purpose, presence, and peace.
dailyDharma.faq2Title: What you‚Äôll find in Daily Practice
dailyDharma.faq2Desc:
‚úî Morning invocations, chants, and affirmations to start the day
‚úî Guided meditations for clarity, energy, and calm
‚úî Breathwork and grounding techniques based in yogic science
‚úî Short reflections on dharma, gratitude, and intention-setting
‚úî Evening wind-down rituals and sacred closing prayers
‚úî Bite-sized stories and teachings for daily inspiration
‚úî Practices designed for all ages, including children and elders
dailyDharma.faq3Desc:
‚úî Anyone looking to cultivate inner calm and consistency
‚úî Beginners unsure where to start with spiritual habits
‚úî Parents wanting simple rituals to share with their kids
‚úî Professionals needing short, grounding pauses in their day
‚úî Seekers seeking structure without pressure
‚úî Elders returning to daily devotion
dailyDharma.faq4Desc:
ü™î Choose one simple practice to begin with ‚Äî and stay consistent
‚è∞ Set a regular time (sunrise, lunch break, before bed)

dailyDharma.faq5Title: What makes KalpX Daily Practice different?
dailyDharma.faq5Desc:
‚úî Spiritually potent, yet simple and practical

explore.title: Explore Videos
explore.subtitle: Reconnect with Your Roots ‚Äî Start Watching

faq.title: Why Explore Spiritual Videos?
faq.description: In a fast-moving world, we often forget to pause and reflect. KalpX Videos offer a moment to reconnect ‚Äî with timeless wisdom, inspiring stories, sacred movement, and devotional depth ‚Äî wherever you are. Whether you‚Äôre watching a classical Bharatanatyam performance, a sacred mantra chant, a ritual from a temple, or a short teaching on karma or consciousness, each video opens a window into Sanatan Dharma‚Äôs living heartbeat. You‚Äôll also find guided meditations, yoga practices, spiritual music, and cultural storytelling ‚Äî all curated to help you grow in awareness, devotion, and joy. Let these visuals transport you beyond the screen ‚Äî into a space of reverence, inquiry, and inner clarity. Watch alone, with family, or as part of your daily spiritual rhythm.

faq.title: What You‚Äôll Find in Explore Videos
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Teachings on dharma, consciousness, and inner peace
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Rituals and poojas from sacred temples across Bharat
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Classical Indian dance (Bharatanatyam, Odissi, Kathak & more)
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Guided yoga, meditation, and breathwork rooted in tradition
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Devotional music, bhajans, kirtans, and mantra chanting
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Stories from the Ramayana, Mahabharata, and Puranas
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Culturally rich videos for children and families
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Dialogues with gurus, yogis, artists, and wisdom keepers

faq.title: Who Are Curated KalpX Videos For?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Spiritual seekers and lifelong learners
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Diaspora audiences reconnecting with their heritage
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Artists, dancers, yogis, and musicians honoring sacred traditions
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Parents introducing dharma to children in engaging ways
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Anyone looking for screen time that uplifts, educates, and transforms

faq.title: What Makes Curated KalpX Videos Different?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Authentic, lineage-rooted content curated with care
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Visuals that inspire devotion, stillness, and self-inquiry
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Diverse voices, regional traditions, and cultural depth
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Made for transformation ‚Äî not just passive viewing

faq.title: How Can I Find Videos That Interest Me?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Use the search bar to find specific topics.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Filter by category, language, or tags to narrow down your selection.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Toggle the Kids Hub for family-friendly content.

faq.title: Are the Videos Available in Multiple Languages?
faq.description:
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Yes, videos are available in languages like English, Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and more.
‚Ä¢ ‚úî Select your preferred language from the filters to view relevant content.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: KalpX ("we", "our", or "us") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you access or use the KalpX platform, including through our website or mobile applications.
privacy.section1Content:
Information You Provide: Name, email, optional profile info.
Automatically Collected: UUID, video events, IP, browser, etc.
privacy.section2Content: To authenticate users, personalize content, track engagement, improve KalpX, and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your data. We may share it with hosting, analytics, or legal entities as needed.
privacy.section4Content: Used to remember your preferences, track engagement anonymously, and improve recommendations.
privacy.section5Content: SSL, authentication controls, and limited access are used to keep your data safe.
privacy.section6Content: You can access, update, or delete your data. Contact us any time.
privacy.section7Content: To delete your KalpX account and data, email us at support@kalpx.com with subject line: "Delete My KalpX Account".
